Carla.

	Carla thought the scale was evilly possessed. She was a very superstitious woman.

questions.text: What was Cliff's message from the scale?
questions.explanation:
"Talk to big wigs".

	Carla figured out that the big wig was God. She asked Cliff if he prayed before he left his house.

questions.text: What did Sam tell Carla her fortune says?
questions.correct: "You will grow lips on your forehead."
options: "You will grow arms out of your ears."
"You will grow eyes out of your chest"
"You will grow toes out of your knees."
questions.explanation:
"You will grow lips on your forehead."

	Carla freaked out believing Sam and took the card to see for herself. When she read the card she said whatever it said was safe so she would be okay.

questions.text: Who said she felt like she was losing her mind?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane got a message from the scale earlier that was true. She didn't want to tell anyone about it but at the same time it had her freaked out.

options: "Lying in a relationship will be fatal."
"Working at a bar is futile for your intelligence"
questions.explanation:
"Deception in romance proves costly."

	Diane went out with another man as a friend but never told Sam. When Sam finds out she hid this he becomes angry and wants to break up with her.

options: "Owning a bar is hard but well worth it."

	Diane and Sam are on the verge of breaking up when he gets his message. It leaves us wondering if they do indeed break up or not.
